input_text:
Job Title: React.js Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
React.js Developer - Remote, USA
About RTeams:RTeams is a forward-thinking technology company dedicated to designing and developing innovative software solutions that redefine business processes and enhance user experiences across a variety of industries. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for cutting-edge technology, we are expanding our team and seeking a talented React.js Developer. This full-time, remote position is open to candidates throughout the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. RTeams provides the option for both contract and regular employment, aiming to find the best match for our team and the successful applicant.
Your Role:As a React.js Developer at RTeams, you will be instrumental in building user interfaces and delivering high-quality front-end development for our web applications. Your expertise in React.js will enable you to craft dynamic and responsive web applications that provide users with an intuitive and engaging experience. Working closely with our team of designers and backend developers, you will play a key role in bringing our innovative projects to life, from concept through to deployment.
Key Responsibilities:Develop and implement highly responsive user interface components using React concepts.Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.Utilize popular React workflows (such as Flux or Redux).Ensure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end services.Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders to ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.Participate in code reviews to maintain high-quality code standards.
Technical Requirements:Profound knowledge of React.js and its core principles.Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux).Familiarity with newer specifications of ECMAScript.Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js is a plus).Knowledge of RESTful APIs.Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools.Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.A strong understanding of version control tools, such as Git.Good understanding of browser rendering behavior and performance.
Experience:2+ years of professional experience in React.js development.A portfolio or samples of past projects and work that demonstrate your expertise and impact.
Who You Are:Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and high-quality user interfaces.A problem solver with excellent analytical skills.Able to work independently and manage your time effectively in a remote setting.A strong communicator, capable of collaborating effectively with a distributed team.Continuously learning and adapting to new technologies and frameworks.
Join Us:At RTeams, youâ€™ll join a team that is passionate about making a difference through technology. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support work-life balance. Here, we value the expertise and passion you bring to our projects.

Experience Level (if available): None

Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
Optimize components for maximum performance across various devices and browsers.
Ensure all user input is validated before submission to back-end services.
Collaborate with designers and backend developers.

Passionate about building scalable, efficient, and high-quality user interfaces, Problem solver with excellent analytical skills, Able to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote setting, Strong communicator, capable of collaborating effectively with a distributed team, Continuously learning and adapting to new technologies and frameworks.
